name: Frontera Energy Corporation
longDescription: Frontera Energy Corp is a Canadian-based company engaged in the exploration, development, and production of crude oil and natural gas reserves in South America. It operates in five segments: Colombia, which includes all upstream business activities of exploration and production in Colombia; Peru; Ecuador & others, which includes all upstream business activities of exploration in Ecuador, the corporate office in Canada, and non-operating entities that have been aggregated; Guyana segment includes all offshore upstream business activities; and Midstream segment includes company's investments in pipelines, storage, port, and other facilities relating to the distribution and exportation of crude oil products in Colombia. The majority of its revenue is generated from the Colombia segment.

The majority of its revenue is generated from the Colombia segment.
